briefTitle: FHIR-Enhanced RealRisks to Improve Accuracy of Breast Cancer Risk Assessments
officialTitle: Integrating EHR and Patient-generated Health Data for Breast Cancer Risk Assessment and Decision Support in a Diverse Multiethnic Population
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women, age 35-74 years
* High-risk defined as 5-year invasive breast cancer risk ≥1.7% or 10 risk ≥20% according to the BCSC or GAIL models
* English- or Spanish-speaking
* Able to sign informed consent.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Women with a personal history of breast cancer
* Women who previously participated in a sub-study (Aim 1) of the awarded grant.
